title: Have a Nanny? Avoid Lawsuits & Tax Problems w Tips from the Experts
desc: With increasing legal protections for domestic workers, lawsuits by nannies against their employers are on the rise.? Learn how to build a healthy relationship with your nanny and the actions you can take ? from hiring to firing ? to comply with the law and avoid a lawsuit against your family. ?We?ll also cover how to comply with payroll tax obligations as your nanny?s employer. During this MeetUp, we'll discuss: ?? Tips for hiring a nanny and drafting a nanny contract. ?? A domestic worker?s rights to sick leave, vacation, minimum wage and overtime regulations. ?? Insurance policies that can protect your family from domestic worker lawsuits. ?? How to take care of payroll taxes for your nanny. ?? What to do if your nanny is an undocumented immigrant. ??
